column2: an A.M. Eatery////Since I'm a rule breaker I got the French toast
column4: and the pineapple upside down pancakes. The pineapple upside down pancakes were buttermilk pancakes with caramelized pineapple chunks
column6: and cinnamon butter. The pineapple chunks were inside the pancakes rather than on top. The French toast was brioche stuffed with mascarpone then griddled and topped with vanilla crème
column9: and toasted coconut. My favorite of the bunch were the peach cobbler pancakes. They also have a pancake of the day so you will have a potentially appetizing surprise on each visit.
